title: Linear Sync Repo Config
description: Configuration for the linear-sync system, stored at .claude/linear-sync.json in a repo root.

_warning.description: Auto-managed warning message. Do not edit.

workspace.description: The Linear workspace identifier. Must match an entry in the local state file (~/.claude/linear-sync/state.json) for credential routing.

project.description: The Linear project name this repo is linked to.

team.description: The Linear team key (e.g., "ENG", "OPL"). Used as the issue ID prefix.

label.description: The Linear label applied to issues from this repo (e.g., "repo:my-repo").

github_org.description: The GitHub org/owner for this repo. Used for GitHub issue sync and org-level defaults.
